articles.description: New Zealand captain Sam Cane says his red card in the Rugby World Cup final defeat by South Africa is something he will have to "live with forever".
articles.title: Red card something I will live with forever - Cane

articles.description: WBC heavyweight champion Tyson Fury claims a controversial split decision victory against former UFC heavyweight champion Francis Ngannou.
articles.title: Fury claims controversial split decision win over Ngannou

articles.description: Charles Leclerc leads Carlos Sainz to a sensational and surprising Ferrari one-two in qualifying for the Mexico City Grand Prix.
articles.title: Ferrari's Leclerc takes surprise Mexico City pole

articles.description: With both Harry Kane and Jude Bellingham lighting up their leagues, who else in world football can claim to have had a better start to the season?
articles.title: Are 'stupendous' Bellingham & record-breaker Kane world's best?

articles.description: South Africa clinch a record fourth Rugby World Cup title by doing just enough to deny 14-man New Zealand and retain their crown in a helter-skelter final in Paris.
articles.title: South Africa edge out New Zealand in epic final

articles.description: The Manchester derby is not a foregone conclusion given the air of uncertainty hanging over both clubs, writes Simon Stone.
articles.title: 'Air of uncertainty' before Manchester derby

articles.description: Watch highlights as Australia beat New Zealand on the last ball in the highest-scoring game in Cricket World Cup history.
articles.title: Australia edge New Zealand in record-breaking thriller

articles.description: The Arizona Diamondbacks level the World Series at 1-1, beating the Texas Rangers 9-1 after a stellar outing from starting pitcher Merrill Kelly.
articles.title: Diamondbacks hammer Rangers to level World Series

articles.description: The Nottingham Panthers' Challenge Cup match at Sheffield Steelers is abandoned after a player suffered a serious cut to his neck from a skate.
articles.title: Match ended after player suffers serious neck cut

articles.description: Hwang Hee-chan concedes a penalty and scores an equaliser as Wolves draw with Newcastle United to extend their Premier League unbeaten run to five matches
articles.title: Newcastle held to draw after Wolves comeback
